project.description: A prediction market platform that makes betting fun and intuitive
project.longDescription: Guess Best is a unique prediction market platform that focuses on making betting fun and accessible. With instant payouts and potential returns up to ×100,000, users can bet on any imaginable topic by simply trusting their gut on crowd opinions. The platform combines the speed of MegaETH with an intuitive betting experience across a wide range of engaging topics.

steps.title: Join via Telegram
steps.content:
To start using Guess Best:

1. Add the Telegram bot @BestGuessBot to create your private room
2. Use the special code 'GMOON' during setup
3. You'll get access to create and manage your own prediction rooms

steps.title: Create Your First Room
steps.content:
As a room creator:

• You can set up custom prediction topics
• Invite friends to participate
• Earn 50% of the 10% platform fee from all bets in your room
• Track your earnings and referral points through the dashboard

steps.title: Making Predictions
steps.content:
When placing bets:

• Choose from a wide range of topics
• Trust your gut on what the crowd thinks
• No special skills or knowledge required
• Potential returns can go up to ×100,000
• Payouts are processed instantly
